summary: Necromancy is a type of magic where people try to talk to the dead. It's like a special ritual where they call upon the spirits of the deceased to appear and share their wisdom. People who practice this believe they can learn about the future or uncover secret knowledge. It's often seen as a dark or dangerous form of magic, and the image of the Witch of Endor summoning Samuel's spirit is a famous example.
title: Necromancy
